author: MrCoconutLeaf
title: Great little build, amazing value
review:
The main build is honestly pretty standard but still nice to get. The crafting table is a simple but good inclusion

The minifigures are pretty cool though. You get Steve (of course), a baby pig, a chick and a new creeper.

There are a lot of printed tiles and the creeper is exclusive which makes this set desirable for collectors. 

Great value and a perfect introduction for new lego minecraft fans

author: TheYummyDish
title: Amazing
review: This is a pretty basic set, very playable with the exploding feature, the parts come together easily as well. For only $10, this is a steal!
